arts.ttl: Transfer rumors, news: Griezmann's MLS move gathers pace
arts.sum: - Liverpool and Manchester City are interested in a summer deal for Bayern Munich midfielder Joshua Kimmich, reports TEAMtalk, with the 30-year-old's contract set to expire at the end of the season and discussions over a renewal not progressing. Antoine Griezmann's long-awaited move to MLS looks set to happen this summer, while Liverpool and Manchester City are both circling Joshua Kimmich .

arts.ttl: La Liga Round Up: Atletico Madrid revive title push as Rayo Vallecano slip again
arts.sum: Saturday’s La Liga action featured another key twist in the thrilling title race as Atletico Madrid stormed to a 3-0 victory away at Valencia. Every step in the title race will be carefully managed by Diego Simeone and Co. but they have sealed a key edge this weekend. arts.ttl: ‘I don’t understand’ – Atlético boss Simeone thinks Valencia should have had a penalty vs his side
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid head coach Diego Simeone has revealed his take that Valencia were denied a clear penalty during the meeting between the two sides. Atlético made the trip to Mestalla…

arts.ttl: Álvarez brace helps Atlético overcome Valencia
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid took provisional top spot in LaLiga with a comfortable 3-0 away win at a toothless Valencia on Saturday thanks to a first-half brace by Julian Alvarez and a late strike by substitute Angel Correa.

arts.ttl: Álvarez scores 2 as Atletico Madrid provisionally moves to the top of La Liga
arts.sum: Álvarez finished off a move in the 12th minute inside Valencia’s area that started with a lifted pass from Griezmann that Samuel Lino volleyed off the bar. Julián Álvarez scored twice to help Atletico Madrid win 3-0 at Valencia on Saturday and lift his team provisionally into first place of the Spanish league.

arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid finalise signing of South American wonderkid
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid are committed to strengthening the options in their youth academy, and in recent days, they have taken another step in the right direction with the addition of a highly-rated South American wonderkid. Allen Obando is the player that Atleti have acquired, as confirmed in the early hours of Saturday morning by his previous […] The post Atletico Madrid finalise signing of South American wonderkid appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Diego Simeone ‘not interested in history’ ahead of Real Madrid reunion
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid looked destined to be drawn up against rivals Real Madrid in the UEFA Champions League Round of 16 next month. Los Blancos powered through the playoffs to once again end Manchester City’s European campaign with wins home and away for Carlo Ancelotti. arts.ttl: Diego Simeone’s surprise comments for his players amid disappointing Celta draw
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid coach Diego Simeone spoke to the media ahead of the team’s La Liga clash with Valencia, but also coming shortly after the Champions League pitched the Rojiblancos against Real Madrid in the last 16. Simeone on the Champions League draw against Real Madrid

arts.ttl: Champions League knockouts: Find out the path to the final in Munich
arts.sum: After the playoff round draw of the new-look Champions League, here's how it impacts the round of 16, the format and the rest of the bracket.
